# load libraries
```{r}
# clear environment
rm(list = ls()) 

# load pakcages
library(DataComputing)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)
library(mosaic)
library(mosaicData)
library(readr)
```

# load data
```{r}
emissionsTable <- read_csv("/home/gabriel/college/Greenhouse Gas Emissions 2018/direct_emitters.csv", skip = 3)
```

# view data
```{r}
str(emissionsTable)
head(emissionsTable, 10)
```


# industries
```{r}
industriesList <- 
  emissionsTable %>%
  select("Industry Type (sectors)")
industriesList
```

```{r}
industriesType <-
  industriesList %>%
  group_by() %>%
  summarise(total = n())
industriesType
```

```{r}
emissionsTable <-
  emissionsTable %>%
  rename(industry = `Industry Type (sectors)`)
```

```{r}
emissionsTable %>%
  group_by(industry) %>% 
  summarise(total = n())
```
